mapper.select: select emr.QC_DOC_NAME, emr.QC_NURSE_NAME, emr.CONSULT_NAME, emr.NURSE_NAME, emr.PAT_NO, emr.FLAG_READMIT, emr.BIRTH_DATE, emr.MED_PAY_MODE, pv.WEIGHT, pv.HEIGHT, inf.WEIGHT infWeight, lab.DATE_LAST, pv.DATE_BEGIN cm0241, pv.DATE_END cm0242, emr.ADMIT_PATH_NAME cm032, lab.NUM_PRODUCT cs111, recdt.DT_OUT_MODE cs113, rec.PRE_WEEKS cs114, recdt.POS_FO cs115, ops.ANES_TYPE_NAME cs124, recdt.DATE_OUT cs242 from EMR_HOME_PAGE emr left join PV_ENCOUNTER pv on emr.PK_PV = pv.PK_PV left join PV_INFANT inf on inf.PK_PV = emr.PK_PV left join PI_LABOR lab on lab.PK_PI = emr.PK_PI left join PV_LABOR_REC_DT recdt on recdt.PK_PV = emr.PK_PV left join PV_LABOR_REC rec on rec.PK_PV = emr.PK_PV left join EMR_HOME_PAGE_OPS ops on ops.PK_PAGE = emr.PK_PAGE where emr.PAT_NO = #{caseId}
